titleStmt.title: Relief of apprentices wronged by their masters how by our law it may effectually be given and obtain'd, without any special new act of Parliament for that purpose.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Stephens (Socrates Christianus). Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
